thread.title: Angelita Wilson
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Angelita Wilson

author: Angelita Wilson
title: Angelita Wilson
text: My family and I keep coming back to Gardner white over and over again for all of our furniture needs! The service is great, the furniture is beautiful and prices are great too! We will continue to shop at Gardner white for many years to come! Thanks again Gardner White!
